qas.question: What are the characteristics of asthma?

answers.text: recurrent episodes of wheezing, shortness of breath, chest tightness, and coughing

qas.question: When are symptoms of asthma normally worse?

answers.text: at night and in the early morning or in response to exercise or cold air

qas.question: What is produced in the lungs by coughing?
Is asthma worst during the day or at night time?
Does everyone have horrible episodes of asthma?

answers.text: Some people with asthma rarely experience symptoms, u

plausible_answers.text: wheezing, shortness of breath, chest tightness, and coughing

qas.question: What phisical symptoms does eosinophils cause?

plausible_answers.text: at night and in the early morning or in response to exercise or cold air

qas.question: When do symptoms of eosinophils become worse?
What is produced in the lungs by shortness of breath?
When do people usually experience eosinophils symptoms in response to?
What do some people have due to their eosinophils?
